title: Since patch 7.15 im getting FPS drops
body:
Its not a gaming PC, but before 7.15 i was getting a solid 100 FPS on high settings. since the patch came out, my FPS randomly drop to 40-30. is it related to league?

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: Hmmmmm there might be some files that weren't updated correctly, but there's also a chance that this is more related to your graphics drivers and how they're interacting with League. Run through this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) making sure to check for any driver updates along the way. After that, run a quick repair through the game client and let me know how those steps help.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o9vLPpM2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-28T02:24:30.881+0000)
>
> Hmmmmm there might be some files that weren't updated correctly, but there's also a chance that this is more related to your graphics drivers and how they're interacting with League. Run through this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) making sure to check for any driver updates along the way. After that, run a quick repair through the game client and let me know how those steps help.

been having these fps issues since 7.11 and none of those helped me
